wikipedia_page.main:
Steve Noon is a British illustrator, born in Kent, England.
Since 1985, Noon has worked as a professional artist. Noon studied Technical Illustration at the Art faculty at Falmouth University (formally Cornwall College of Further and Higher Education) in Cornwall.  His illustrations have been award-winning, particularly those under publisher Dorling Kindersley.Noon has illustrated books like A City Through Time and A Street Through Time that are part of a collection of books.

response: * McCulloch, Ian Macpherson and Steve Noon (2008). Highlander in the French-Indian War. 1756-67, Osprey Publishing, 64 p.  (online excerpt)
